resultid.title: Resultid
resultid.description: The unique identifier for the consultation in our system.

lang.title: Lang
lang.description: Target language for the notes. It may be different from the language of the audio. If it is indeed different, we will translate the transcription and the notes to the target language.

langCult.title: Langcult
langCult.description: Target language culture for the notes.

subSpecialty.title: Subspecialty
subSpecialty.description: Optional sub specialty. If not specified, the specialty will be used.

isMulti.title: Ismulti
isMulti.description: If it is a multi-consultation visit, i.e. a visit with multiple cosultation reasons.

contentType.title: Contenttype
contentType.description: The content type of the file. Refer to https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types/Common_types for a list of available MIME Types.

errorCode.description: You can force and error by informing the error code here. This is useful for testing the error handling in your application.
